text: Radhika Ranjan Pramanick (18 December 1932 â€“ 13 December 2020) was an Indian politician. He was born in West Bengal, British India. Pramanick was a member of the All India Trinamool Congress. From 1989 to 2004, he was a member of the Lok Sabha. Pramanick died on 13 December 2020 in Kolkata, India at the age of 87.TMC leader, five-time MP Pramanik passes away ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Trinamool Congress politicians Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians
title: Radhika Ranjan Pramanick
